last_episode_to_air.name: Pandora's Box
last_episode_to_air.overview: When a man dies on a bus, Bea is warned off the case but refuses to stop digging - and Patience fears for her safety

name: Patience
overview: Patience Evans works in a clerical role filing police records. An autistic woman, she has a special interest in solving puzzles and a secret fascination and talent for criminologyâ€”her unique perspective allows her to connect the dots through clues in a way others simply cannot.

seasons.name: Series 1
seasons.overview: Patience catalogues evidence in the Yorkshire Police records department. A brilliant self-taught criminologist with keen crime scene instincts, her talent is spotted by Metcalf, opening new worlds for the archivist.
